metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0125 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from12.0 before 14.4.5, all versions starting from 14.5.0 before 14.5.3, allversions starting from 14.6.0 before 14.6.2. GitLab was not verifying thata maintainer of a project had the right access to import members from atarget project.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
